group_1.textLeft: Leave it to you...? You mean you'll find@where it should be delivered?

group_1.textRight: No, we do not offer that service.
While all we can do is Coordinate@your Soul Gem,
we're capable of more than just@simple strengthening.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I know this! You guys can change@our appearance when we transform!

group_1.textRight: Fuuumun, funmun!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I got it right? Yaaay!@That's what my Big Sis does sometimes!

group_1.textRight: If you have your appearance changed through@Coordination, your magic may also change with it,
which could possibly help us determine@where this gift should be delivered.

group_1.textLeft: May I choose the type of new magic@I receive?

group_1.textRight: Unfortunately, it's not that convenient.
But in the same way that one's personal@magic is affected by the wish made,
it appears that a strong sense of will at the time of@Coordination also affects one's personal magic.
I can't be certain, so we're going out@on a limb here, but...

group_1.textLeft: Very well. Please go ahead; it's worth a try.

group_1.textRight: In that case... Are you certain you want@to do this alone, Miss Satomi?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: Sudachi is also here, so we can@Coordinate up to two people.
We've both learned from our teacher,@so you can do it, Sudachi, can't you?
Fumuu!
I believe the chances of us being able@to deliver this gift will be better...
...if we have the magic of two people who@have been Coordinated with the same will.

group_1.textLeft: I see, so I'll need a partner...

group_1.textRight: Okay! Let Mii do it!
I haven't gotten my free Coordination yet,@so that means it's okay, right?
Fumumun!

group_1.textLeft: ...I'll pass.
I think Mikage is more invested@in delivering this than I am.
Then I would like Mikage to be my partner.

group_1.textRight: Very well. Please stand side-by-side here.

group_1.textLeft: Please continually remind yourself@that you want to deliver this present.

group_1.textRight: Fumumuuu...!

group_1.textLeft: We've changed! We've truly changed!

group_1.textRight: You and Mii are dressed up almost@the exact same way!
This means we shared the same will, right?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm certain that's the case!
What do you think, Rabi?@How does it look?

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:103302:lipSynch_1]Befana.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? What is that?

group_1.textRight: ...I thought of Befana as well when@I set my eyes upon them.

group_1.textLeft: Befana... That name rings a bell...

group_1.textRight: Say, isn't this outfit like something that old@witch from all those picture books would wear?

group_1.textLeft: The word "Witch" makes me think of the entities@we must fight; it's a loaded term.
I think it's preferable that we use@the word "sorceress."

group_1.textRight: Then as you say, Befana is the name@of a sorceress.
She is a prominent character in@Italian folklore,
a sorceress who delivers treats.

group_1.narration: "Befana, in her search for the son of God,@uses a bright star as her guiding light@as she delivers gifts of baked goods@to people's stockings..."

group_1.textRight: That's how it goes.
Speaking of which, the Three Wise Men also@appear in the lore pertaining to Befana.

group_1.textLeft: It's remarkably similar to our situation.
We're sorceresses handing out sweets,
and Yozuru and the other Coordinators@are the Three Wise Men of the East.

group_1.textRight: Precisely. When I saw you,@Befana instantly came to mind.

group_1.textLeft: I-is that a good thing?

group_1.textRight: What are you talking about, Nayutan?@Of course it's a good thing!

group_1.textLeft: What?!

group_1.textRight: I mean, if this Befana lady is a sorceress@who hands out sweets,
then you and Mii's new magic@must be something...
...that makes it easy for us@to deliver gifts!

group_1.textLeft: You're right... I'm sure there must be@some magical means...
...of determining who this present is for so that@we can bring it to the intended recipient.
We have no time to waste - let us get@this present sent!

group_1.textRight: Woohoo!
According to legend, however,@Befana never found the son of God.
She still wanders around cities to this day,@searching for him...

group_1.textLeft: I-I'll...just pretend I didn't hear that.
